## Source: ossf-malware-analysis (59cdc01afa05cd90c8814ecd8dd94f555b32681004eabf13194d1f7b6c52d4f9)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'thisisjustfortesting' @ 1.0.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
